name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an improvement or new feature
title: '[Feature] '

assignees: ''
---

## Problem

What problem does this feature solve? What's frustrating today?

## Proposed Solution

How should it work? Be as specific as possible.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you thought of other approaches? Why is your proposed solution better?

## Additional Context

Mockups, examples from other tools, or any other relevant information.

---

> **Tip:** If you have ACT installed, use `/act-feedback` to suggest features with your project context.
